summary: This is an email chain between legal parties regarding the scheduling of Ghislaine Maxwell's criminal trial. It includes an attached scheduling order setting jury selection for the week of November 15, 2021, and the trial start date for November 29, 2021.

events.title: Jury Selection for Maxwell Trial
events.description: Jury selection is scheduled to occur during the week of November 15, 2021, for the criminal trial of Ghislaine Maxwell.

events.title: Start of Maxwell Criminal Trial
events.description: The criminal trial of Ghislaine Maxwell is scheduled to begin on November 29, 2021.

locations: One Saint Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: The court issued a scheduling order for Ghislaine Maxwell's criminal trial (Case No. 20 Cr. 330).
Jury selection was scheduled for the week of November 15, 2021.
The trial was scheduled to begin on November 29, 2021.
The correspondence involves the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York and the law firm Panish Shea & Boyle.
The document is an email chain dated May 12, 2021, discussing trial scheduling logistics.
